title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 647.17 - Application for rehearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 647.17 - Application for rehearing

State Regulations

Any party may apply to the board for rehearing within 10
days after entry of a final decision on an appeal, unless such time is
shortened or increased by order of the board. The application shall be served
and filed and shall state with particularity the points of law or fact which
the applicant believes the board has overlooked or misapprehended. No oral
argument on the application will be permitted; no answer is
required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6

647.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
